info.summary:
☀️Entrepreneur | Soft. Architect & Dev. / DevOps. on | WEB | IA |
CBDC | Crypto currency | Blockchain | Innovation & New Technology
Enthousiasm | Professor UTBM
Meroux, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France

Summary
I believe that Digitalisation and Innovation are two powerfull ways to
leverage efficiency to reach a result !BUT, without the right peoples,
or team ,or environement, this is not possible! The first part of my
belief has been completed by the experience that shaped my mind.
I was 12 when I first discovered the web, and I still can remember
that feeling of something amazing that I did not understand! I
remember telling my father : "Why can't I access the web ? I have
the icon of the internet - Internet Explorer's Icon - here, this should
lead me to the Web ? Why not ? ", at that time, my father didn't know
so much of the internet, but he only knows one important things:
accessing internet needs a modem access. Then, I was frustrated
of not having the answer to my WHY questions, why do I need a
modem ? Why ..., you know that kind of questions a child is capable
of asking along the whole day!
Then, I grown up using, playing, learning in computer's universe,
from my Atari STMega, to my first PC on a x286, repairing and
soldering my little electronics game pad - ancestor of a game boy -,
playing and learning with passion anything I could around computer
and electronics.
Passion is what defined the most my considerations of computer,
sciences, electronics, innovations, mathematics and all what I could
learn. I'm willing to learn and to share knowledges from every people
that I meet and I'm working with, and I'm also aware that there will be
so much I will never be able to understand and to learn :-)
I was / I'm / I will be developing or helping the dev. of full-stack mix
technology applications ( iOT, Web, iOS, Android, AR/VR, Native/
Desktop ) for different industry fields and I love to deliver great
projects, products and features ! I'm not alone as I have the chance
Page 1 of 5

Enthousiasm | Professor UTBM
Meroux, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France

Summary

I believe that Digitalisation and Innovation are two powerfull ways to
leverage efficiency to reach a result !BUT, without the right peoples,
or team ,or environement, this is not possible! The first part of my
belief has been completed by the experience that shaped my mind.

I was 12 when I first discovered the web, and I still can remember
that feeling of something amazing that I did not understand! I
remember telling my father : "Why can't I access the web ? I have
the icon of the internet - Internet Explorer's Icon - here, this should
lead me to the Web ? Why not ? ", at that time, my father didn't know
so much of the internet, but he only knows one important things:
accessing internet needs a modem access. Then, I was frustrated
of not having the answer to my WHY questions, why do I need a
modem ? Why ..., you know that kind of questions a child is capable
of asking along the whole day!

Then, I grown up using, playing, learning in computer's universe,
from my Atari STMega, to my first PC on a x286, repairing and
soldering my little electronics game pad - ancestor of a game boy -,
playing and learning with passion anything I could around computer
and electronics.

Passion is what defined the most my considerations of computer,
sciences, electronics, innovations, mathematics and all what I could
learn. I'm willing to learn and to share knowledges from every people
that I meet and I'm working with, and I'm also aware that there will be
so much I will never be able to understand and to learn :-)

I was / I'm / I will be developing or helping the dev. of full-stack mix
technology applications ( iOT, Web, iOS, Android, AR/VR, Native/
Desktop ) for different industry fields and I love to deliver great
projects, products and features ! I'm not alone as I have the chance

Page 1 of 5

to be among a network of great talented peoples that can bring
skills, passions, knowledges, fun, wisdom, experience, contradictions
to help Delivering !

When I meet people, I like to say that I can be Javascript, ES6,
nodejs, python, Java, J2ee, AngularJS, ReactJS, Bootstrap ,
MaterialUI or whatever, as I believe it fits the target and I can be part
of the project. I love technology but having to work in industry also
brought me that reality of the field that makes people think carefully
twice before upgrading a framework or a software or a hardware
versions. I know what it takes to handle a production breakdown with
end customer's impact! This helped me build wisdom.

I would say that passion build sharp mind, experience shape smooth

individuality, and will help balance the force :-D.

Experience

Zonova, Innovation and App. at the speed of your idea !

6 years 2 months

‍ Advisor of International Institution in Digital Technology
July 2017 - Present (6 years 2 months)
France

When it comes to find their ways among Digital Technology, International

institution are facing unbeatable challenges as their needs is to understand /

solve / evaluate / use feed-back / deploy / implement / design / scale / organize

the right combination of Technologies to beat their challenges.

On this path for a challenging journey, as a Passionnate Technology

Developer, I'm enthusiasm in helping these Internationals Institutions.

☀️Why ?

I'm willing to help them handling the most balanced decisions regarding

benefits that will rise in the long term journey.

I believe that we are at that very moment where we can solve challenges that

have been postponed for decades, or spoil everything, and I want to help

solving thoses challenges !

Page 2 of 5

☀️ How ?

I'm helping in building projects, teams and actions to address these great

Challenges.

☀️ What ?

It is all about BlockChain, CryptoCurrency, Data Sciences, Sciences, Artificial

Intelligence, Computer Sciences !

‍ Consultant in Digital Technology
July 2017 - Present (6 years 2 months)
Belfort, Meroux

I'm part of a company which is bringing Innovation and Digitalisation,

I help bringing your idea to life at an unexpected speed !

️️ This, with solutions fitted to your need (budget/techno) at every each phasis

of your idea, project and needs !

What an amazing fact I encoutered : the less digitalised organization are the

ones which outcomes the most valuable part of the market when they take the

path of Digitalisation and Innovation,

So should you be willing giving the idea, the methods, the process or the skills

a try, get in Touch :-) with us

https://www.zonova.io

Puissance E
